DOC.detailed_description: Darbepoetin alfa ( Aranesp ) long-acting ESA approve treatment anaemia CKD patient , may administer week ( QW ) , every two week ( Q2W ) month ( QM ) correction maintenance CKD patient dialysis . Prescribing information darbepoetin alfa update August 2013 ( EU Australia ) , incorporate option correction QM dosing frequency CKD patient dialysis . There little published literature describe QM correction real-world setting . Data obtain study intend contribute filling literature gap provide robust source information physician .
